alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued May 17 at 3:53AM EDT until May 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures in the mid to upper 20s possible. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
